name: Bill Gates
description: Philanthropist, Tech entrepreneur, Co-founder of Microsoft, World's Richest Person

name: Mark Cuban
description: American businessman, investor, film producer, and owner of the NBA's Dallas Mavericks. Also a Shark on Shark Tank.

name: Elon Musk
description: South African-born Canadian American entrepreneur, engineer, inventor, investor, CEO and CTO of SpaceX, CEO and product architect of Tesla Motors, founder of SpaceX and a cofounder of PayPal

name: Oprah Winfrey
description: Host of The Ophrah Winfrey Show, actress, producer, and philanthropist

name: Larry Page
description: American computer scientist and internet entrepreneur, co-founder and CEO of Google

name: Mark Zuckerberg
description: American computer programmer and Internet entrepreneur, co-founder, chairman, and CEO of Facebook

name: Hilary Rodham Clinton
description: American politician and former United States Secretary of State, former First Lady and Senator

name: Steve Jobs
description: American entrepreneur, marketer, inventor, was co-founder, chairman, and CEO of Apple Inc.

name: Stephen Colbert
description: American comedian, writer, actor, host of The Colbert Report, Late Night host
